Frank,
 
I have to disagree.
I believe they have a purpose for putting so =
much effort into relating this communication in the hopes
that we will stri=
ve to better the communication so as to get better and clearer messages tha=
t convey their precise intention.
 
Mike and Lisa have told me how difficul=
t it is to transmit this communication and they have a sense of urgency in =
their messages
trying to make us sit up and take notice. 
 
I would hate to=
 believe they do not care about the outcome of man kind and ignore our prob=
lems, no matter how petty they may seem
to a higher being. there has to be =
a method and an end to their means. I don't think they are participating in=
 this miraculous communication for entertainment.
 
If I am misunderstandin=
g your meaning, which has happened to us in the past. Please let me know.
 =

Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: warrior18eii@yaho=
o.comDate: Fri, 25 Jan 2008 06:28:17 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted=
 just a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep rate answers






Bruce=
,The powers that be on the other side can't even begin to relate to human r=
ationality or our petty perspectives. The beings I am talking about know ex=
actly what we are conversing about at the moment it is typed on the screen.=
 With one thought of them they are aware of your presence. Them seeing us i=
n not an issue...lol. We have their attention but for the most part they do=
n't have ours (as in the human race).Regards,Frank R.
----- Original Messag=
e ----From: bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...>To: evp-itc=
@yahoogroups.comSent: Thursday, January 24, 2008 6:09:22 PMSubject: RE: [EV=
P-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep rate an=
swers

LC, I believe that is what our spirit friends are striving for,to le=
t mankind know there is something bigger than ourselves. Maybe if the power=
s that be could hear that with their own ears from the otherside they may s=
top and take a breath of rationality. As for the catalyst I think that is w=
hat we are meant to be! Bruce
Bruce Halliday 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .comF=
rom: lcdupla@yahoo. comDate: Thu, 24 Jan 2008 23:54:12 +0000Subject: [EVP-I=
TC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep rate answe=
rs


Bruce,It's going to take a major change for harmony, peace and elevate=
d mindset to occur in mankind...major perspective change for sure. That wil=
l demand some catalyst to unite- transform minds IMHO.LC--- In EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups .com, bruce halliday <paranormalinvestig ating@... > wrote:>> > LC,=
> > In my opinion what our friends mean by the messages> of "no more time" =
or "time running out" Is meant > as a warning to mankind that if we do not =
change and realise that life > and mother earth are precious, and how to li=
ve together> in "harmony" we are doomed to extinction.> > The sense of urge=
ncy I believe is meant to make us understand that global tensions > at this=
 time could very well bring about this destruction, If someone decides to t=
urn left instead of right.> > That's my take on these type of messages, and=
 I get at least one every couple of sessions.> > Bruce> Bruce Halliday > > =
> To: EVP-ITC@...: lcdupla@...: Thu, 24 Jan 2008 21:05:50 +0000Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep rate an=
swers> > > > > Nice, interesting files, Bruce. You and FS (his post today) =
got me wondering about this time no more thing...not to mention I heard sim=
ilar statements of urgency over my RS box set-up, too. Any more ideas regar=
ding this, Bruce...FS.. .others? I personally believe time to be illusion, =
and I also know it is written "time will be no more" (biblical future proph=
ecy).Still not sure where I fall with this, other than I do agree on this u=
rgency, elevating consciousness, etc LC--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "bh=
ali333" <paranormalinvestig ating@> wrote:>> Hey boy's and girls,> > Here a=
re some new Frank's box files. You may find the ones about sweep > rate int=
eresting. > > There are quite a few good ones, New researchers please take =

each > FB.> > Bruce> > > > > > > > ____________ _________ _________ _______=
